entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Friday 29 April 2016
